MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:30am to safely complete repairs on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:39am on Wednesday, 10 March 2021
